summary.span: 表示 物件的集合，這個集合共同組成了 的幾何。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects that collectively make up the geometry of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了如所述，這個類別的成員的行為完全如所述， ，和文件。Except as noted, members of this class behave exactly as described by the , , and documentation. **Freezable 功能：** 因為它繼承自類別類別會提供數個特殊功能：物件可以宣告為唯讀以改善所做的多個物件之間共用效能、 複製，並變更為安全執行緒。**Freezable Features:** Because it inherits from the class, the class provides several special features: objects can be declared as , shared among multiple objects, made read-only to improve performance, cloned, and made thread-safe. 如需詳細資訊，所提供的不同功能的相關物件，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md)。For more information about the different features provided by objects, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/freezable-objects-overview.md). ## XAML 隱含集合用法XAML Implicit Collection Usage ``` ``` ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為物件衍生自，一起使用時將它們複製。Because objects derive from , they are copied when they are used. 因此，更新版本中，您可能會無法擷取，或移除您加入使用原始的集合物件。Therefore, later, you might not be able to retrieve or remove the you added to the collection using the original object. 集合中是一份原始，並被視為不同比您所加入。The in the collection is a copy of the original and is considered a different than the one you added. 此實作會擲回如果您嘗試新增**null** (**Nothing**) 參考。This implementation throws an if you attempt to add a **null** (**Nothing**) reference.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合搜尋開始第一，向前並在最後一個結束。The collection is searched forward starting at the first and ending at the last . 這個方法會執行線性搜尋;因此，平均執行時間成正比的值。This method performs a linear search; therefore, the average execution time is proportional to the value of . 亦即，這個方法是 O (*n*) 運算，其中*n*等於。That is, this method is an O(*n*) operation, where *n* is equal to .
